00037 /* Creation flags */
00038 #define XNREUSE  0x00000001     /* Reuse pod with identical properties */
00039 
00040 /* Pod status flags */
00041 #define XNRPRIO  0x00000002     /* Reverse priority scheme */
00042 #define XNTIMED  0x00000004     /* Timer started */
00043 #define XNTMSET  0x00000008     /* Pod time has been set */
00044 #define XNTMPER  0x00000010     /* Periodic timing */
00045 #define XNFATAL  0x00000020     /* Pod encountered a fatal error */
00046 #define XNPIDLE  0x00000040     /* Pod is unavailable (initializing/shutting down) */
00047 #define XNTLOCK  0x00000080     /* Timer lock pending */
00048 
00049 /* Sched status flags */
00050 #define XNKCOUT  0x80000000     /* Sched callout context */
00051 #define XNHTICK  0x40000000     /* Host tick pending  */
00052 
00053 /* These flags are available to the real-time interfaces */
00054 #define XNPOD_SPARE0  0x01000000
00055 #define XNPOD_SPARE1  0x02000000
00056 #define XNPOD_SPARE2  0x04000000
00057 #define XNPOD_SPARE3  0x08000000
00058 #define XNPOD_SPARE4  0x10000000
00059 #define XNPOD_SPARE5  0x20000000
00060 #define XNPOD_SPARE6  0x40000000
00061 #define XNPOD_SPARE7  0x80000000
00062 
00063 /* Flags for context checking */
00064 #define XNPOD_THREAD_CONTEXT     0x1 /* Regular thread */
00065 #define XNPOD_INTERRUPT_CONTEXT  0x2 /* Interrupt service thread */
00066 #define XNPOD_HOOK_CONTEXT       0x4 /* Nanokernel hook */
00067 #define XNPOD_ROOT_CONTEXT       0x8 /* Root thread */
00068 
00069 #define XNPOD_NORMAL_EXIT  0x0
00070 #define XNPOD_FATAL_EXIT   0x1
00071 
00072 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICKHANDLER  (&xnpod_announce_tick)
00073 
00074 #define XNPOD_ALL_CPUS  XNARCH_CPU_MASK_ALL
00075 
00076 #define XNPOD_HEAPSIZE  (CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SYS_HEAPSZ * 1024)
00077 #define XNPOD_PAGESIZE  512
00078 #define XNPOD_RUNPRIO   0x80000000 /* Placeholder for "stdthread priority" */
00079 
00080 /* Flags for xnpod_schedule_runnable() */
00081 #define XNPOD_SCHEDFIFO 0x0
00082 #define XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO 0x1
00083 #define XNPOD_NOSWITCH  0x2
00084 
00085 /* Normal root thread priority == min_std_prio - 1 */
00086 #define XNPOD_ROOT_PRIO_BASE   ((nkpod)->root_prio_base)

00152 #define xnsched_resched_mask() \
00153     (xnpod_current_sched()->resched)

00155 #define xnsched_resched_p()                     \
00156     (!xnarch_cpus_empty(xnsched_resched_mask()))

00159     xnarch_cpu_isset(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())

00165     xnarch_cpu_clear(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())

00167 #define xnsched_clr_mask(__sched__) \
00168     xnarch_cpus_clear((__sched__)->resched)

00276     nkpod->watchdog_armed = 0;

00284 static inline int xnpod_get_qdir (xnpod_t *pod)
00285 {
00286     /* Returns the queuing direction of threads for a given pod */
00287     return testbits(pod->status,XNRPRIO) ? xnqueue_up : xnqueue_down;
00288 }
00289 
00290 static inline int xnpod_get_minprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00291 {
00292     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00293         pod->minpri + incr :
00294         pod->minpri - incr;
00295 }
00296 
00297 static inline int xnpod_get_maxprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00298 {
00299     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00300         pod->maxpri - incr :
00301         pod->maxpri + incr;
00302 }
00303 
00304 static inline int xnpod_priocompare (int inprio, int outprio)
00305 {
00306     /* Returns a negative, null or positive value whether inprio is
00307        lower than, equal to or greater than outprio. */
00308     int delta = inprio - outprio;
00309     return testbits(nkpod->status,XNRPRIO) ? -delta : delta;
00310 }
00311 
00312 static inline void xnpod_renice_root (int prio)
00313 
00314 {
00315     xnthread_t *rootcb;
00316     spl_t s;
00317 
00318     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00319     rootcb = &nkpod->sched[xnarch_current_cpu()].rootcb;
00320     rootcb->cprio = prio;
00321     xnpod_schedule_runnable(rootcb,XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO|XNPOD_NOSWITCH);
00322     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00323 }

00325     /* -- Beginning of the exported interface */
00326 
00327 #define xnpod_sched_slot(cpu) \
00328     (&nkpod->sched[cpu])
00329 
00330 #define xnpod_current_sched() \
00331     xnpod_sched_slot(xnarch_current_cpu())
00332 
00333 #define xnpod_interrupt_p() \
00334     (xnpod_current_sched()->inesting > 0)
00335 
00336 #define xnpod_callout_p() \
00337     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_sched()->status,XNKCOUT))
00338 
00339 #define xnpod_asynch_p() \
00340     (xnpod_interrupt_p() || xnpod_callout_p())
00341 
00342 #define xnpod_current_thread() \
00343     (xnpod_current_sched()->runthread)
00344 
00345 #define xnpod_current_root() \
00346     (&xnpod_current_sched()->rootcb)
00347 
00348 #define xnpod_current_p(thread) \
00349     (xnpod_current_thread() == (thread))
00350 
00351 #define xnpod_locked_p() \
00352     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK))
00353 
00354 #define xnpod_unblockable_p() \
00355     (xnpod_asynch_p() || testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK|XNROOT))
00356 
00357 #define xnpod_root_p() \
00358     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT))
00359 
00360 #define xnpod_shadow_p() \
00361     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNSHADOW))
00362 
00363 #define xnpod_userspace_p() \
00364     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT|XNSHADOW))
00365 
00366 #define xnpod_primary_p() \
00367     (!(xnpod_asynch_p() || xnpod_root_p()))
00368 
00369 #define xnpod_secondary_p() \
00370     (xnpod_root_p())
00371 
00372 #define xnpod_idle_p() xnpod_root_p()
00373 
00374 #define xnpod_timeset_p() \
00375     (!!testbits(nkpod->status,XNTMSET))

00379     return nkpod->ticks2sec;
00380 }

00382 static inline u_long xnpod_get_tickval (void)
00383 {
00384     /* Returns the duration of a tick in nanoseconds */
00385     return nkpod->tickvalue;
00386 }
00387 
00388 static inline xntime_t xnpod_ticks2ns (xnticks_t ticks)
00389 {
00390     /* Convert a count of ticks in nanoseconds */
00391 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00392     return ticks * xnpod_get_tickval();
00393 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00394     return ticks;
00395 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00396 }
00397 
00398 static inline xnticks_t xnpod_ns2ticks (xntime_t t)
00399 {
00400 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00401     return xnarch_ulldiv(t,xnpod_get_tickval(),NULL);
00402 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00403     return t;
00404 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00405 }

00461 static inline void xnpod_lock_sched (void)
00462 {
00463     spl_t s;
00464 
00465     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00466 
00467     if (nkpod->schedlck++ == 0)
00468         __setbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00469 
00470     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00471 }
00472 
00473 static inline void xnpod_unlock_sched (void)
00474 {
00475     spl_t s;
00476 
00477     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00478 
00479     if (--nkpod->schedlck == 0)
00480         {
00481         __clrbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00482         xnpod_schedule();
00483         }
00484 
00485     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00486 }

00517 static inline void xnpod_yield (void)
00518 {
00519     xnpod_resume_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),0);
00520     xnpod_schedule();
00521 }

00523 static inline void xnpod_delay (xnticks_t timeout)
00524 {
00525     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNDELAY,timeout,NULL);
00526 }

00528 static inline void xnpod_suspend_self (void)
00529 {
00530     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNSUSP,XN_INFINITE,NULL);
00531 }
00532 
00533 static inline void xnpod_delete_self (void)
00534 {
00535     xnpod_delete_thread(xnpod_current_thread());
